Text:
"as-of-yet-unamed new art form"

re: unamed -- It's parody. That's how Neely managed to do it without getting sued. Parody is protected derivation.

re: new -- Obviously, not. For very good, recent examples predating Neely's work, see Firesign Theatre's several dialog replacement parodies based on 40s and 50s movie serials.
I just copied the description from the website. O_o
